channel.title: Can't fix need help
channel.description: Okay, i downloaded Utorrent to host my server until i can buy a router and portforward but i have to shut it down and re-open it for ppl to log in i had it were ppl could log in without me shutting it down and re-opening it but all of a sudden this happened ( i have to shut it down and re-open it) And idk how to fix it i tried re-installing it, it does the same stuff. Does anyone know how to fix it?

item.title: Can't fix need help
item.dc:creator: @trollromance trollromance
item.description:
@trollromance wrote:

I downloaded Utorrent to host my server and everything was going good ppl were loggin in but all of a sudden my friend IM’s me on msn saying he can’t log in so now everytime when someone wants to log in i have shut it down and re-open it. Idk how it happened or how to fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't fix need help
item.dc:creator: @Kryptick Kryptick
item.description:
@Kryptick wrote:

You need to be more clear with what the problem is…

Read full topic
